entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle and flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 8:05 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:05 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023
